title: NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS WITH REJANE / HYPNOTIC INDUCTIONS WITH FASCINATION / EPISODE 3
description:
This is the third episode of the video series "NON-VERBAL HYPNOSIS WITH REJANE". The previous episodes you can watch here: episode 1 - https://youtu.be/OB7qlh980vg episode 2 - https://youtu.be/OB7qlh980vg In this final part of the series, the subjects reactions are getting even stronger. Rejane hypnotized them only with the power of her gaze - the Fascination technique, that she learned from Dr. Marco Paret. One of the subjects started screaming and moving epicly, due to the energy that went within him. She did not used any words, but the subjects entered in deeply healing trances, that changed them positively. After this powerful experience they hugged her, thankful for the liberating non-verbal hypnosis. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
